body_html:
Yes, sgdr_decay from the contrib package is not available anymore.
Instead, one can use cosine_decay_restarts function, which is implemented here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/learning_rate_decay.py#L600

The documentation is available here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/train/cosine_decay_restarts

I do not know why the link was not added to the api_guides section

@martin-gorner Do you want us to fix this? If it is the case then can you point me to the files which are used to generate api_guides part of the documentation?

body:
Yes, **sgdr_decay** from the contrib package is not available anymore. 
Instead, one can use **cosine_decay_restarts** function, which is implemented here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/learning_rate_decay.py#L600

The documentation is available here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/train/cosine_decay_restarts

I do not know why the link was not added to the api_guides section

@martin-gorner Do you want us to fix this? If it is the case then can you point me to the files which are used to generate api_guides part of the documentation?
